mapper.select: select tp.perm_id,tp.perm_name from tbl_permission tp inner join tbl_role_permission trp on trp.perm_id = tp.perm_id inner join tbl_role tr on tr.role_id = trp.role_id inner join tbl_user_role tur on tur.role_id = tr.role_id inner join tbl_user tu on (tu.user_id = tur.user_id and tu.status = 0) where tu.username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_permission ( perm_name, description, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{permName}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update:
update tbl_permission
perm_name = #{permName},
description = #{description},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where perm_id = #{permId}
